item.description: Hey there, I’m Satyam, your friendly neighborhood software engineer by day and a nocturnal code wizard by night. 2am coffee? That’s when I’m in my element. Used to have a grudge against Java, but hey, now we’re buddies. And let’s not forget about Go, my new partner in crime. Interests ğŸ‰ Programming Languages: Java, Go Hobbies: Watching football âš½, diving into non-fiction and classic fiction books ğŸ“š Gaming: FIFA sessions on my Playstation ğŸ® Music: Rocking out to Pink Floyd ğŸ¸ Chess: Taking down GMs on chess.
